attributes.action: Open a public enquiry into the reports of Gov' Cronyism during the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: As Brexit looms, the spending of sheer millions of pounds on contracts that have failed to deliver, companies who buckle under the pressure because they didn't have the infrastructure to deal with the demand - this must be investigated into to see whether the money could've been better spent, perhaps the deliberate underfunding of the NHS was in part to blame, who is responsible? Why haven't they been brought forward to face the consequences? Any normal person doing this would be sacked.
attributes.background: Investigate the reports of corruption and Cronyism. Has the NHS been deliberately underfunded to the point that outsourcing to party donor owned company seems plausible? This would normally be considered a conflict of interests and the offender, disciplined.
